EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to PM when GM Approves Site Visit Report
EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Report GM Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Site Visit {!SiteVisit__c.Name} has been Approved by {!SiteVisit__c.GrantMonitor__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!SiteVisit__c.ProgramManager__c},
This email is to notify you that the Grant Monitor has Approved the Site Visit Report {!SiteVisit__c.Name} and is read for your review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
